MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's warm and sunny this morning,
making it a perfect day to hang the laundry.
For the past few days, it has been raining in the city center of St. Iris, and the students living in the dormitory have been waiting for this moment to hang their laundry outside...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
The wind is whipping around. It feels good.
I didn't know there were such strong winds in St. Iris.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But because of that, everyone's laundry is flying around. Tornado~ Tornado~ shirts, socks, and some fancy underwear. It's so colorful and beautiful!

In the afternoon, strong winds suddenly begin to blow. Tornadoes break out on the school ground, equipment flies away, students' skirts fly up, and laundry that had been hung out to dry is blown to the top of the academy building.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'm fine with this kind of wind.
The lighthouse where I lived has the strongest winds.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Besides, I didn't hang out my laundry.
I don't have to worry so much.

But it seems that some people
are suffering from the effects of these strong winds.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah! My laundry is flying away! The Ranger Transformation Set I bought in Verforet! I've only worn it in front of Conductor!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Waah! My underwear, too!
Everything else is fine, but my underwear!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Eh? Are those yours, Queensway!?
Don't tell me Conductor asked you to wear them!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: N-no! No, it's not that! They were Lancaster's choice...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Does the conductor like to dress the Train Knights
in different kinds of clothes?
Would I do that? It's only if they want to. At least that was the case with Putra. She really wanted me to see...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Putra has always been like that. When she buys a new bathing suit, she comes straight to me and shows me.

It seems that Kuang and Putra are friends from the same hometown and used to hang out together even before they joined the SSS. I heard that Putra used to jump across the shallow rocks to the island to meet Kuang...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
My lighthouse is on an island, but it used to be connected to land.
When the tide is low, there is a rocky area where you can jump across.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Putra came across that rocky beach to see me. She said we're friends who live on the same land. I like Putra's kindness.

If they are connected by the same land, she should cross it.
That's what Putra would think.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I've been getting a lot of help from Putra ever since he was in Flamarine.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
That's why we decided I would help her as much as possible
when she's in trouble.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's just about time. Look at that.
Putra and Queensway are in trouble.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Gyaah! My Ranger Transformation Set
is on the roof of the academy building!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
M-my colorful collection is stuck on the top of the tower!
It's like a festival flag!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's a slightly naughty series of Sexy Bomber, a famous brand from St. Iris. She doesn't want them to be seen by too many people, right?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'll help.
The tornado had just swept up a pair of Queensway's luxury brand underwear, which is caught on the tower of the academy building and is flapping in the wind. It's a perfect example of being exposed.
So Kuang says she's going to run and help them, but...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Putra, Queensway!
I'm bringing them downstairs now, so wait there!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Kuang!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Aah! Kuang! Thank you! Thank you so much!
To my surprise, Kuang climbs up the wall of the academy building to the roof, and then goes straight up to the top of the tower. The students who are watching below applaud her.
...Then, Finchley jumps out of the building with a devilish look on her face.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Putra
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Gah!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Instructor Finchley...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eek, eek~ I'm a monkey. I'm not Kuang~

Kuang disappears from the tower with her excuse,
but then Finchley's serious pursuit brings her to justice...
